refnamediv.refpurpose: Print a string constant or variable

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: puts prints a string with an optional newline at the end whenever the trigger signal is positive and changes.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: inonl (optional, defaults to 0) -- if non-zero, disables the default printing of a newline character at the end of the string

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ktrig -- trigger signal, should be valid at i-time. The string is printed at initialization time if ktrig is positive, and at performance time whenever ktrig is both positive and different from the previous value. Use a constant value of 1 to print once at note initialization.
